name: Memory of Cheongsam No.12
description:
Cheongsam seen as an iconic dress design from Chinese culture. A root of culture who also inside my DNA in between others from Middle East and Java. Cheongsam as a traditional idea remains some question in contemporary art field; does the pattern that seen as representation of nature (trees or flowers) is subject matter of the design or the women as the subject who wearing it are another point? Well, I saw another pattern behind the Cheongsam which I can use it as the construction of knowledge about human body.
Please don't be so serious to do that. That's mine.  

Artist name: Argus FS
Address: Bandung city
Print Size: 150 cm by 90 cm
Media: C-Print on canvas
